radiographic_examinations.findings: High probability of pulmonary emboli suggested
Dysplasia in erythroid precursors and megakaryocytes; no ring sideroblasts; 2% blasts

radiographic_examinations.date: 5 months after the initiation of lenalidomide
radiographic_examinations.findings: 15% cellular, increased erythropoiesis, morphologically normal megakaryocytes; near-complete cytogenetic response
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Indicates improvement from previous dysplastic findings

radiographic_examinations.findings: Recurrent morphologic dysplasia with abnormal hypogranulated myeloid cells; 11% myeloblasts
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Indicates progression to refractory anemia with excess blasts (RAEB2)

radiographic_examinations.date: After signs of recurrent anemia and thrombocytopenia
radiographic_examinations.findings: 32% myeloblasts, confirming evolution to acute myeloid leukemia (AML)
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Indicates progression from myelodysplastic syndrome to AML
